source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Mastering Glazing Techniques in Watercolor
items.headline: How to make your watercolor paintings glow
objectives_summary: Diligent students should be able to perform all of the techniques demonstrated in this course.

items.title: Watercolor painting WATER in nature - simple tips to help.

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore

items.headline: Lakes, canals, waterfalls, waves & fountains made easier to paint in watercolours. Improve you brush techniques too.
objectives_summary: Learn some simple techniques to paint believable water in watercolour.
Add interest to your watercolour painting by adding realistic water effects
Build your watercolour painting confidence by doing this course

items.title: Wire Wrapping : Jewelry Making for Beginners
items.headline: Learn to Create Beautiful and Unique Jewellery with Wire Wrapping Techniques..
objectives_summary: This course is the first step in learning the art of Wire wrapping. You will weave, sculpt and transform the wire to create beautiful jewelry pieces.
Together we will create seven beautiful pendants in this course!!
Learn all about wires: wire types, shapes, sizes and their particular uses.

items.title: Making Polymer Clay Jewelry With Metal Foil
items.headline: How To Make Extraordinary Jewelry Pieces And Sets
objectives_summary: Work with polymer clay - applying metal foil and get different effects
Make beautiful jewelry including stud earrings, hanging earrings, rings, beads and pendants
Finish jewelry and make simple components by using wire and pliers

items.title: Subjects with Pen and Ink
items.headline: Master Pen and Ink Drawing
objectives_summary: The basic materials, tools, and surfaces for working with pen and ink.
Application techniques including hatching, cross hatching, scribbling, stippling, and ink wash.
How to draw any subject with basic shapes to ensure accuracy.

items.title: How To Draw CHARACTERS for Kids

visible_instructors.job_title: Illustrator and Instructor at How To Draw Comics . net
visible_instructors.name: Ed
visible_instructors.title: Ed Foychuk

items.headline: Cartoon Drawing for kids
objectives_summary: basic drawing skills
how to follow drawing instruction
how to understand shapes in relation to characters

items.title: Watercolor paint CHICKENS. Loose shapes, poses & plumage.FUN

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Artist, Teacher and Creative Entrepreneur
visible_instructors.name: Nicola A
visible_instructors.title: Nicola A Blakemore

items.headline: Learn how to paint the shape, poses, colors, feet, heads & feathers just right for fun & believable painted chickens.
objectives_summary: Learn how to create a chicken from a basic shape.
Students will be able to sketch and paint believable chickens.
This will help students with their overall drawing and painting skills.

items.title: Color Mixing - New & Easy - for Acrylic & Oil Painters

visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Painter, International Author & Art Instructor
visible_instructors.name: Nancy
visible_instructors.title: Nancy Reyner

items.headline: Match color perfectly! Train your eye without boring color wheels!
objectives_summary: Achieve color expertise!
Improve your ability to see and understand color.
Learn to mix and match colors with confidence.

items.title: Comic Book Creation Masterclass: Draw Amazing Superheroes!
items.headline: The Ultimate Guide to Drawing Comic Book Heroes from Start to Finish Using a Free Tool!
caption_languages: ภาษาอังกฤษ [อัตโนมัติ]
objectives_summary: By the end of this course, you will be armed with the skills to create your own comic book art from scratch.
You will know the step by step process of creating comic book characters.
You will understand how to turn your ideas into an actual comic book stories.

items.title: Paint a Watercolor Rose - Watercolor Painting for Beginners
items.headline: Paint a Luminous Yellow Rose in Watercolor Step by Step!
objectives_summary: Create watercolor paintings with more vibrancy and colors that glow! Lecture breakdown is as follows:

Setting up: I offer a PDF supply list of the materials I use, and instructions for getting yourself ready for the painting process. I also provide an outline of the rose and photo reference that you can print out if you wish, along with instructions on how to trace it onto your watercolor paper.
Lesson 1: I show you tips for getting off to a good start with the very first wash of color, getting an even tone and planning highlights.

items.title: Gorgeous Light Watercolor Secrets for the Beginner Artist
items.headline: Roll Reverse your way to astounding watercolor paintings
objectives_summary: You will learn how to create gorgeous light in your watercolor paintings.

items.title: Design & Composition Guidelines: Create Your Own Awesome Art

visible_instructors.job_title: Learn To Paint Loose With Acrylics & Watercolor
visible_instructors.name: Robert
visible_instructors.title: Robert Joyner

items.headline: The ultimate guide to learning design and composition ideas.
objectives_summary: You will gain the knowledge to take images and scenery and turn them into workable, successful paintings.

Discover How To Use Water Mixable Oil Paints
Learn About The Mediums For Water Mixable Oil Paints

what equipment you need and where to get it

items.title: The Fundamentals of Drawing

visible_instructors.job_title: Artist, teacher and author of bestselling drawing books
visible_instructors.name: Barrington
visible_instructors.title: Barrington Barber

items.headline: The complete course for everyone who wants to learn how to draw
objectives_summary: Sketch out the basic forms of a subject – be it a simple object, landscape or face.
Add detail to their drawings, bringing them to life.
Compose their artwork for maximum effect.

items.title: Intro Class on Mixed Media Magazine Paper Collage
items.headline: Learn How to "Paint" with Magazines
objectives_summary: How to make a collage using magazines.
What magazines to select.
How to paste paper to avoid wrinkles and air pockets.
